isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3600, 3800, 4000FBC - CAB ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION

svcsubproc.title: Horn
svcsubproc.para: The dual electric horns (high and low note), located on the front engine mounting crossmember, provide a means for the driver to signal or provide warning.

svcsubproc.title: Turn Signals
svcsubproc.para: Turn signals provide a driver with the means to signal, oncoming traffic or following vehicles, of intended turns or lane changes.

svcsubproc.title: Turn Signals with Dual Face Lights
svcsubproc.para: Turn signals provide a driver with the means to signal, oncoming traffic or following vehicles, of intended turns or lane changes. The optional dual face lamps are mounted on top of the front fenders and provide additional signaling.
